The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared more than 6,400 times.
The photo shows several bare: footed men in a room with large quantities of noodles on the floor.
The post: s caption includes a derogatory term ("kafirs") and suggests that the products are made by non-believers in Islam.
The company mentioned in the claim: KBB Resources Berhad (now EKA Noodles Berhad), is halal-certified by the Department of Islamic Development Malaysia (JAKIM), indicating that their products are permissible for consumption by Muslims.
